review_data.title: Good meat, great fries, amazing quality service

review_data.title: Best Burger in town
review_data.content: That's good. Urban feeling. Stylish and warm interior. Burgers (much) better than elsewhere in Bern. Chips are also way above average for Bern. Very friendly service. Interesting cocktail card. Maybe they could improve their beer menu.
